title: Authors and Citation

what: Receiver Operating Characteristic Based on Power Lindley Distribution
title: Receiver Operating Characteristic Based on Power Lindley Distribution
text: goal PLindleyROC evaluate Receiver Operating Characteristic (ROC) Power Lindley Distribution. Additionally, performace asssesments can performed associated Bi-Power Lindley ROC model.

what: Receiver Operating Characteristic based on Power Lindley Distribution — PLindleyROC
title: Receiver Operating Characteristic based on Power Lindley Distribution — PLindleyROC
text: ROC curve analysis performed assuming samples Power Lindley distribution. Specificity, sensitivity, area curve ROC curve provided.

title: Receiver Operating Characteristic based on Power Lindley Distribution — PLindleyROC
code: dPLD(x, alpha, beta)  pPLD(x, alpha, beta)  qPLD(p, alpha, beta)  rPLD(n, alpha, beta)  r.pl_auc(   x,   y,   init_param = c(alpha1 = 1, beta1 = 1, alpha2 = 1, beta2 = 1),   true_param = c(alpha1 = 1, beta1 = 1, alpha2 = 1, beta2 = 1),   method = c("MLE", "ADE", "CvM", "LSE", "WLSE", "TRUE") )  r.pl_index(   x,   y,   init_param = c(alpha1 = 1, beta1 = 1, alpha2 = 1, beta2 = 1),   init_index = 1,   true_param = c(alpha1 = 1, beta1 = 1, alpha2 = 1, beta2 = 1),   method = c("MLE", "ADE", "CvM", "LSE", "WLSE", "TRUE") )  r.pl_graph(   x,   y,   init_param = c(alpha1 = 1, beta1 = 1, alpha2 = 1, beta2 = 1),   true_param = c(alpha1 = 1, beta1 = 1, alpha2 = 1, beta2 = 1),   empirical = TRUE,   method = c("MLE", "ADE", "CvM", "LSE", "WLSE", "TRUE") )

title: Receiver Operating Characteristic based on Power Lindley Distribution — PLindleyROC
text: x, y vector quantiles. alpha shape parameter. beta scale parameter. p vector probabilities. n number observations. length(n) > 1, length taken number required. init_param initial paremeter values estimation method. true_param true parameter values. method estimation method. init_index initial index value optimization calculation. empirical empirical must TRUE FALSE. alpha1 shape parameter distribution first sample. beta1 scale parameter distribution first sample. alpha2 shape parameter distribution second sample. beta2 scale parameter distribution second sample.

title: Receiver Operating Characteristic based on Power Lindley Distribution — PLindleyROC
text: dPLD gives probability density function Power Lindley Distribution. pPLD gives cumulative density function Power Lindley Distribution. qPLD gives quantile function Power Lindley Distribution. rPLD gives random numbers Power Lindley Distribution. r.pl_auc gives Area Curve (AUC) data conforms Power Lindley Distribution. r.pl_index gives index values data conforms Power Lindley Distribution. r.pl_graph gives ROC curve data conforms Power Lindley Distribution.

title: Receiver Operating Characteristic based on Power Lindley Distribution — PLindleyROC
text: probability density function (PDF) cumulative distribution function (CDF) follows: $$f\left( x;\boldsymbol{\theta }\right) =\frac{\alpha \beta ^{2}}{ \beta +1}\left( 1+x^{\alpha} \right) x^{\alpha -1}\exp \left( -\beta x^{\alpha }\right)$$ $$=zg_{1}\left( t\right) +\left( 1-z\right) g_{2}\left( t\right),$$ $$F\left( x;\boldsymbol{\theta }\right) =P\left( X\leq x\right) =1- \left( 1+zx^{\alpha } \right) \exp \left( -\beta x^{\alpha }\right),$$ quantile function given $$Q\left( u;\boldsymbol{\theta }\right) =F^{-1}\left( u; \boldsymbol{\theta }\right) =\left\{ -\frac{W\left( \left( 1+\beta \right) \left( -1+u\right) \exp \left( -\left( 1+\beta \right)                                               \right) \right) +1+\beta }                                      {\beta }\right\} ^{\frac{1}{\alpha }},$$ $$z =\frac{\beta }{\beta +1},$$ $$g_{1}\left( x\right)  =\alpha \beta x^{\alpha -1}\exp \left( -\beta x^{\alpha }\right),$$ $$g_{2}\left( x\right)  =\alpha \beta ^{2}x^{2\alpha -1}\exp \left(-\beta x^{\alpha }\right),$$ \(\boldsymbol{\theta =}\left( \alpha ,\beta \right) \), \(0<u<1\), \(\alpha>0\) shape parameter, \(\beta>0\) scale parameter W(•) Lambert W function.
